title: Whitman Mission National Historic Site: Plan Your Visit
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit           Plan Your Visit          Whitman Mission National Historic Site includes the original mission site, a mass grave where Marcus and Narcissa Whitman are buried, the Whitman memorial shaft, and a Visitor Center with a small museum. The park is located in southeastern Washington, 7 miles west of Walla Walla off of Highway 12. Other sites of interest are located in Walla Walla and the surrounding area. more . . .
